website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its sturdy construction and the fact that it can go five hours between refills.
pros: Comes by itself, or you can purchase it with a grate
Puts out 6000 BTUs and can burn for five hours between refills
Sturdy stainless steel unit that inserts into tabletops or fireplaces
cons: Some buyers report issues with this option rusting within six months
Aesthetically, some find it hard to get a good-looking flame

website_summaries.verdict: The best overall ethanol fireplace that is the perfect size for outdoor gathering spaces.
pros: Large square footprint will fit in a variety of outdoor spaces without taking up much room
The optional grate adds more visual flair and an extra layer of protection
cons: Snuffer doors discolor from the flame over time

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice piece. So nice... I bought another one! Well constructed and a big clean flame. Tried the other similar priced one but this is so much cleaner looking and while the opening is smaller, the flame is much larger. Highly recommended! Just an update... I had a question on the unit and contacted them.... They got back to me imediately! and really helped me out. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Man

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this fireplace burner!! Found out I couldn't have a gas fireplace insert since my tv was mounted on the front of my fireplace too close to the opening -- and no other place to put the tv in my living room. I ordered the smaller burner (12" overall width; 8" opening) since I wanted a small fire mostly for aesthetics. It arrived quickly - and WELL packaged. The set-up involved putting it in my fireplace, adding ethanol fuel, and lighting. It is everything I wanted at a reasonable price! I have ordered ceramic logs from Ignis.com to place around the burner to make it a bit more appealing. Overall a full 5 star rating!!
customer_reviews.author: olivers

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We live in a condo so our fireplace options are limited as our building has no gas lines, and electric fireplaces are a complete farce. So I decided to build one and use an ethanol burner - this was exactly what we needed to make the fireplace complete! It gives off a decent amount of heat for our small, 1000 sq ft apartment. The flames are pretty big, especially as we put ceramic logs over top to hide the metal burner (because we wanted a more traditional look, not a modern one). One bottle of fuel lasts about 4.5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.....LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS !
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING !!!!! I had an old fire place that is not vented! We thought we would Never use it again, as we had carbon monoxide issues and our entire family was overcome with it. we took out the gas and it just sat for 10 years, as a bad reminder! we ordered this burner box and put in the fuel and We had a beautiful fireplace in our dinning room once more! With no chance of carbon monoxide poisoning and no toxins, just a beautiful fire that even warmed the room! LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: gary smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my DIY fireplace
customer_reviews.text: There are endless possibilities of what you can do with this insert. I found a decorative tin, put some sand in the bottom, placed this insert in it, and then surrounded it with river rocks. I placed it right in my fireplace but it can be used just about anywhere. I was using gel fuel before but this insert with the pour-able fuel is a much better idea. It is well built, easy to refill and easy to extinguish if you need to before all the fuel is used up. At night and in early morning it is really pretty to sit in front of my homemade fireplace. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fireplace Insert
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace insert fit perfectly into my original coal burning fireplace that was built in 1901. The quality seems very good and the flame reached 8" - 12" after warming up for about 10 minutes, plus put out a good amount of heat. I would highly recommend to anyone looking to add a fire at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I own an old 1923 house that has a very shallow coal fireplace. While looking for an odd size gas insert for home I am renovating I "discovered" the existence of bio-ethanol fireplace inserts and burners. After researching I purchased this unit. It is perfect for my purposes. In the firebox I installed reflective metal all around. Then the fireplace opening is covered with an old iron Victorian cover. The illusion is of a much larger fire because of all the reflections. The flame is nice - it will take off the chill of the room that I keep at 62 degrees. Would definite purchase again and will probably get a wall hanging unit for my mountain house sun room.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Adams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and flame.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in a timely manner - and much to my surprise the box was heavy for its size. I opened the box and found the firebox to be made from a quality stainless steel - with a thick baffle inside. I pulled out my gas fireplace insert and installed this ethanol firebox. Easy to install and after adding the fluid - the flame impressed me too. As it says in other interviews - the flame starts out small - but after and few minutes - it was a perfect flame (as shown in video - the longer video would not upload). I like this firebox.
customer_reviews.author: jq

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a fireplace which is set up for burning wood. I m always anxious about the fumes, the smell. So I decide to switch to an ethanol fireplace. I used one of these burners. Covered with faux ceramic wood logs. It's perfect. So easy to maintain. We light up the fire almost every night. A single bottle of ethanol lasts about 4 hours. The flame is a good size. And of course it's real. Gives good heat. And the ethanol has no fumes or smell.
customer_reviews.author: eyescapes

customer_reviews.title: This thing is HOT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really HOT!!! I totally love the look, I ordered it with the fuel that they sell at Ignis as well. It looks beautiful and fits perfect in my fireplace. I have a 150 year old house with 5 fire places but the chimneys are not in working order so this thing makes it look like the fire place works and is fantastic. I got 2 and I think I may order 3 more!!! They do get hot and I had to cut back my flame a little by shutting the door on the top half way to cut back on the flame hight but it is great. Will buy more!! Recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY IGNIS!
customer_reviews.text: I can hardly believe something this cool exists! The cold weather has made me jealous of my friends fireplaces. But there really is no place in my house to put one. So I started thinking about a small portable fireplace that I could use both in my home and when I go out car camping. Something cozy to burn outside or inside that won't put off poison fumes. I started looking for something I could make but found the Ingnis, Reasonably priced, well made and exactly what I was looking for. I am even excited by the possibilities of customizing my little fire place! I will be getting more of these!
customer_reviews.author: A. SPRING

customer_reviews.title: Greener option
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a greener burning flame for our fireplace and this definitely did the trick. Nice flame, nice heat, looks good, fit very well into fireplace space. I also like how versatile it is, can be used in other places in the home for a cozy option without much fuss or need for a major clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Better than cleaning a fireplace of ash and coals at the end of winter.
customer_reviews.text: If you don't use the fuel up each time you fill the insert up it will just dry up and then you have wasted money. Also if any of the liquid dries on the face of the burner it basically leaves rust behind. On the positive side it does give a pretty ambiance to my living room fireplace and cold winter nights without the mess and smoke of a traditional fireplace fire.
customer_reviews.author: Tunegirl7

customer_reviews.title: Cozy feel
customer_reviews.text: I can’t see this heating up a room, but well worth it for the look. Have used a few times and I love it. Give off such a nice flame. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Ignis EB1200 is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Within 20 minutes of receiving the Ignis EB1200 it was in our fireplace and we were watching a beautiful blue & yellow flame on a cold winters night. So much better than those faux wood logs and no creosote smell in the morning and no chimney to worry about cleaning. A pint of biofuel lasted about 2 hours. Definitely the best solution to addressing those cold dark winter nights besides Netflix. The quality of the unit is great, very heavy and sturdy stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Bill_B

customer_reviews.title: Indoor Fireplace Coffee Table, DIY
customer_reviews.text: I now have the coolest vintage mobile in the park. Mine has a new indoor table top fireplace that I made,DIY, from the Ignis EB 1200 Ethanol Fireplace Burner Insert and a retro aluminum metal coffee table. It gives off the perfect flame; not too much heat but just enough to give it a super cozy feel. I love my new insert and will be buying a bigger one for California Room next. Note: Ignis Products make it real easy to order and buy their products either through Amazon.com or direct through their website at www.ignisproducts.com. They have the best price on fuels with free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieT

customer_reviews.title: Simple, sturdy, fast.
customer_reviews.text: This burner is solid, was easy to place in our retro preway fireplace and makes lighting a fire super easy. I did read the dimensions and knew the size but the unit did initially appear small to me. The flames aren’t super high so if you want to fill a largish fireplace I would go bigger. The only thing I miss from initially using the gel fire cans is the crackling noise that the cans created. The ease of use of this unit (my husband opened it and lit a fire in literally 2 minutes last night!) makes it an overall win though.
customer_reviews.author: Lp

customer_reviews.title: Very simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this small ethanol burner to test in a small enclosed area of our home in the hopes I would be persuaded to purchase a larger, electronic version of the same unit. It looks like it's a winner! It was up and running within a few minutes of un-boxing. The flame is about 12" plus high when the opening is unrestricted and lasts for about 2 hours with only 1/2 liter of fuel. The plan is to install a larger version in the wall of our house and use this one for table mood lighting or outside on the patio table. Very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, for the price, it's absolutely incredible. I actually downsized from a 24 inch ethanol insert bc I felt it was making my Firebox way too hot. Even though this is only 12 inches the flames are more than enough for good ambiance without getting my firebox too hot. I put ceramic wood around it and an iron log holder.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Bryan

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome insert that can be used in several different ways
customer_reviews.text: My roommate and I live in a small apartment that doesn't allow fireplaces so I decided to build my own. I purchased this to put inside a small coffee table I created out of wood milk crates. This is an awesome insert that can be used in several different ways. The burner itself is surprisingly heavy and built solid. Doesn't throw off enough heat to warm a small space, but is an excellent conversation piece. Also, a great one time promotion that IGNIS offers once you purchase their products is they will send you 3 bottles of fuel if you review the product.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Heavy stainless and great construction
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed and solid ethanol burner. It was shipped fast and arrived quickly. I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: arrived very quickly. Great price, solid design, not cheaply made. better price than other brands. I am going to put this into an existing wood burning fireplace. It looks very good inside of it. I am also excited about being able to move these around the house and use them wherever. They are not at risk of blowing away. Like I said, very solid and not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The perfect casual atmosphere
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of theseto help change our cool-in-the-winter breezeway into a morning and evening sitting room that allows us to enjoy the winter view of the sunrise and sunset in comfortable warmth. These two Ignis inserts really provide a nice, but not overwhelming, warmth that allows for a nice morning coffee and paper as well as a romantic evening with a glass of wine or a night cap. These are a modest size, but with two of them in 25x25 room with 10 foot ceiling and wall to wall glass doors and windows, you don't need larger. We love them and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: John (from East Lansing)

customer_reviews.title: Robust
customer_reviews.text: I received the item it was packaged very well foam on all sides for shipping. I was shocked at the weight of the metal it it really heavy! This burner is solidly built for years of use. The finish is really clean and brushed. It is perfect for my project of a concrete table top with the burner inset in the table surface. Great product I really would have expected to pay over a hundred for this burner.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. It is durable, sleek and modern looking. It fits nicely in our fireplace mantel (originally intended for the gel fuel) and creates high flames due to the ignition of the surrounding edges. I personally favor the ethanol fuel rather than the gel fuel as it seems to burn cleaner and doesn’t produce such potent, headache-inducing smell. Sometimes you may need to shut the lid abruptly to completely extinguish the flame. I’ve been very happy with this ethanol fireplace burner insert so far.
customer_reviews.author: grrr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for an inoperable fireplace space. Put a couple ceramic logs in front of this to make it more realistic not futuristic.
customer_reviews.author: SC girl

customer_reviews.title: Easy fire with no clean up
customer_reviews.text: Flame bigger than I thought. Must fill all the way with fuel for it to work. Put it in a chiminea Iined with Pacific rocks. Perfect for what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: KMags

customer_reviews.title: We just use it outside but it works great. We have a few different decorative holders to ...
customer_reviews.text: We just use it outside but it works great. We have a few different decorative holders to put it in. I will probably buy another so we don't have to keep moving it.
customer_reviews.author: Prime addict

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and it does warm a room!
customer_reviews.text: The insert is great, very well made and excellent quality! I even showed it to a producer of similar inserts and he praised the quality of it and even recognized it was better than his! Additionally to being beautiful, I used it to warm a small TV room of 170 square feet and it does a great job. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, superior quality, good functionality. Lighting wand was damaged during shipping but Amazon Customer Service was great and resolved promptly. Would recommend to anyone looking for a small fireplace to add small amount of heat and great ambiance to any room or outdoor area.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Arnett

customer_reviews.title: This ventless fire place is great. Not only does it add a very nice ...
customer_reviews.text: This ventless fire place is great. Not only does it add a very nice visual appeal to any room but it also add a great deal of warmth. We use this product in our living room and it works great. It has excellent construction and is extremely sturdy. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a ventless or portable fire place. I plan on purchasing another one very soon. We are extremely pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped it would be!
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. So easy to use and it looks beautiful. Wasn't as heavy as I thought it would be per other postings. Love the compact size and the finish is lovely. Easy to clean as well. Have used both in my fireplace and outdoors. I live in AZ where we have a lot of No Burn restrictions due to air quality and this allows us to enjoy a lovely fire regardless of restrictions.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie B

customer_reviews.title: Great Fireplace Insert
customer_reviews.text: We have had an outdoor table and fire pit for years without being able to use it on our Lani. I purchased this Burner from Amazon and installed it in the fire pit. I added some glass rock and we now have a wonderful fire blazing in our glass room. I highly recommend this product to anyone wanting a easy fireplace insert.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have converted Wood burning to Ethanol
customer_reviews.text: I love this burner. I use it in my woodburning fireplace. It burns clean. no more smell or mess like with burning wood. Easy to snuff out when done. Now all I need are ceramic logs to add to the look.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: but the burner was delivered in perfect condition despite the box being left out in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but the burner was delivered in perfect condition despite the box being left out in the rain all evening. Couldn't be happier. I fully expected it to be soaked all the way through. The burner itself is sturdy and heavier than I expected. It looks very solidly made and I can't wait for the fuel to arrive so I can try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: insert fits perfect in my gel fireplace, and gel stinks when it burns, ethanol for this has no odor at all, only wish it came with the wick or at least said in the description that it had no wick in it. otherwise great product
customer_reviews.author: Robert carbine

customer_reviews.title: a smaller flame but the product is such great quality. We are going to order a bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller than I expected, a smaller flame but the product is such great quality. We are going to order a bigger one for our fireplace and use this one for the deck. Easy to use, no mess, smell or clean up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great option for apartment
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!! Beauitful flame, good design. I didnt realize it came with a long match light which makes lighting it a breeze. Ive reccomended it to two friends already. Only thing I would suggest to a buyer is buy the bulk fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our dirty, in-used wood burning fireplace is re-born
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve purchased this years ago! Our dirty, in-used wood burning fireplace is re-born!
customer_reviews.author: chadwick007

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to a small room
customer_reviews.text: We order this to put in our bedroom in a TV/Fireplace we got from walmart and it fit perfectly in 24X10 fireplace burning area. It actually heat the whole room. It needed a little more fuel than I thought it would to fill it to the max line but we are really pleased with the product
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S.

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a customer of mine, and she absolutely loves it! The flames flicker and change color, it is really very pretty to watch. Other similar products were also considerably more expensive, this one is a great deal! My only complaint is that the lid doesn't slide open and close very easily, it goes crooked and gets stuck. But for the price it is great!
customer_reviews.author: handygal

customer_reviews.title: Great Tabletop Fire Pot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Mother's Day. She is the creative type and was looking to create a tabletop fire pot for our patio. It worked out perfectly. She found a great metal basket at a garden shop to put it in, then lined the top with some river rocks. Now we have a great center piece for out outdoor patio.
customer_reviews.author: MarlTroutBum

customer_reviews.title: It creates a nice ambiance for a rainy day indoors
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of this little insert. It creates a nice ambiance for a rainy day indoors. Don't expect it to replace a fire; the flame is not huge. But it is calming and inviting. The design is sleek and simple. It fits in our small, bricked in fireplace. I am sure we will get many hours of joy out of using the insert.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kolta

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Purchase Experience!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any indoor project. This complimented my DIY coffee table perfectly. Well made and very clean look. I would highly recommend for anyone looking for a fireplace insert. Shipping was fast as well!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Del Broccolo

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars for a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased an Ignis EB1200 Ethanol Burner and am delighted at its performance. My family and I have spent many hours watching the cheerful flame dance back and forth across the burner. I am impressed by its construction and ease of use. We much prefer it to our gel fuel burning fireplace as the fuel burns completely and without odor. It earns every bit of a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Dubcak

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best affordable alternative to an actual fireplace. I bought a gel fuel fireplace, but after going through a few cans, I quickly realized how expensive it was going to be to enjoy the fireplace. I saw this insert and took out the metal piece that holds the cans, this fits in perfectly! I can now enjoy my fireplace double the time for less money!
customer_reviews.author: Kris in Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this and tested just now. It works wonderfully. 1 qt can burn over 4 hrs and heat enough our home. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Cutest fireplace ever!
customer_reviews.text: Even more sleek and beautiful than I had imagined. Can't wait to fire it up, still waiting on the fuel. I plan to make a stone box for it and use it in my studio for heat and inspiration as a 360 degree fire feature. Pics later!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie from Washington

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because of the reviews and am very pleased with this insert. I tried it out with one bottle of fuel (which did not fill completely) and the flame lasted about 3-1/2 hours. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: good design.
customer_reviews.text: Creates more of a traditional ambiance for my 1908 fireplace with the Ignis stainless steel burner. Well constructed, high quality, good design.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian M.Gallery

customer_reviews.title: Well made but the flame does not last as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: These ar well made and give good amount of heat. I have two in a firebox. The doors discolor from the heat. However if you have the doors fully open a full tank will only last 3 hours or so.
customer_reviews.author: HeavyThumb

customer_reviews.title: Great for an old fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: We bought his burner for a small fireplace in our restored condo in New Orleans. The flue had been closed up years ago and we didn't want to go electric. This unit works very well. The flames coming through the ceramic logs looks very realistic. The ethanol burns clean and there is no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Ambiance...warm my heart!
customer_reviews.text: Yay! Now my fireplace works! We stopped using our fireplace because of crack in the back wall of the insert...but now we're at it again! And, in Texas, you don't need heat as much as ambiance! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: fantastic for tabletop outdoor fireplace
customer_reviews.text: fantastic for tabletop outdoor fireplace. takes a few times to light it when the ethanol is cold, but after it warms up, it is a stable flame with good size. beautiful modern sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace Burner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the EB1200 ethanol burner and 3 bottles of fuel. It is easy to use and looks great. I am not sure of how much heat it actually gives of and the fuel seems to burn rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: L Brown

customer_reviews.title: I have them installed in a custom built flagstone short wall so that those seated on the patio can enjoy it. Comes with a tool t
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these to gang them together and create a 24 in unit. One can of ethanol or denatured alcohol will burn several hours. I have them installed in a custom built flagstone short wall so that those seated on the patio can enjoy it. Comes with a tool to adjust the trap door and reduce the flames if it is windy. If used out side, I don't recommend lighting it until dark or dusk because you will not be able to see the flames very well. Glad I purchased this item
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: A warmer home for the winter.
customer_reviews.text: The Ignis fire box is a high quality stainless steel unit. It is easy to use and heats a room as advertised. I would recommend it to anyone wanting a clean and efficient way to heat a area in your home. I wish we had done this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Tentai

customer_reviews.title: Will not miss Gel fuel cans!
customer_reviews.text: Will not miss the Gel fuel cans. This burner looks and feels well made. This Burner gives a nice flame to it. Looks great in the fireplace. Nice being able to to get hours out of a single fill, or use use it for a little while and being able to relight easily.
customer_reviews.author: William Lamer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes, more for ambiance than heat. That's why I bought a table top one for heat
customer_reviews.author: Becky Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product butvthe manufacturer screwed me out of the free fuel promo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just placed it in my fireplace on the grate and plan to add my ceramic Firestone pebbles to the grate for an awesome affect. Can't wait to see everything together
customer_reviews.text: This burner insert is sooo sleek and effective. I just placed it in my fireplace on the grate and plan to add my ceramic Firestone pebbles to the grate for an awesome affect. Can't wait to see everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Pattrice  S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely surprised of the quality of material, nice heavy stainless steel. Almost plug and play, just add fuel and light.
customer_reviews.author: donita stegman

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to wood burning! I love the ambiance without the mess! It was so easy to set up, too.
customer_reviews.author: PSorin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Consistent use is not likely due to the fuel being too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fire!
customer_reviews.text: Love to have a cozy fire immediately without needing to vent smoke or clean out ashes. I may never buy wood again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great integrated into Concrete!
customer_reviews.text: I make concrete countertops and have made several coffee tables with these heaters integrated into them. They look great and people love them too. The price is very fair as well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Flame is not as prominent as shown. I did find adding wicking much improved flame.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle reader

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This little unit is great! I'm using it in my fireplace instead of burning those stinky synthetic logs. I used silica sand to surround the unit in the fireplace and then added the tumbled glass for a modern effect. Looks awesome and the unit itself puts out a nice flame. I would definitely recommend this product to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Welk2000

customer_reviews.title: DIY Fireplace Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Great little fireplace that puts out a bunch of heat. I filled an old wooden crate we had with rock and placed this inside for a cheap DIY fireplace that I made for under 100 bucks total. Once it is going for a while it will actually heat up the rock around it and really put off some heat. All in all I am really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: plager5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's an insert, not to be used by itself, you could but it's very institutional looking without finishing.
customer_reviews.author: I. S. Pollak

customer_reviews.title: This is a great alternative to a wood burning or propane fire pit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to a wood burning or propane fire pit. It has a very sturdy construction and works great. The burner doesn't emit a lot of heat but is very nice to look at. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The ventless fireplace gives off no odor and the warmth is wonderful to take the edge off a cold night. It is just the right mood and size for a casual evening at home, can't wait to try it outside this spring and summer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great fireplace insert
customer_reviews.text: Great fireplace insert. Received it, filled it and boom: instant ambience. We have it in our living room fireplace for now but plan on taking it out on the patio for the cool fall nights!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: I love this little ethanol burner
customer_reviews.text: I love this little ethanol burner. I bought it as a last minute Christmas gift. Our old house has coal burning fireplaces that we've never been able to use. This little ethanol burner fits great in the space and feels just right!
customer_reviews.author: thatannie

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty. Dropped it in the top of a whiskey barrel at poolside. This is a very unique item.
customer_reviews.author: Alley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome well made and performs exactly as advertised!!!. Shipped very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Tomaro Zaragoza

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well made ethanol fireplace. This one's going ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable and well made ethanol fireplace. This one's going into a concrete coffee table. Can't wait for winter to set in and the relaxing hot cocoa by the fire.
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and the fire looked better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Bandaid315

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and to fill with the ethanol ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and to fill with the ethanol fuel!! I love that I can have a real fire and NOT have to clean up smelly, dirty ashes!! This has worked great this winter!!
customer_reviews.author: karen ram

customer_reviews.title: Nice Investment!
customer_reviews.text: Good, quality craftsmanship. Works well and looks beautiful. It is a process to get it to stay lit, however. Takes several tries and the fumes ignite in a big "woof" a few times before it stays lit.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product! Excellent burn time, and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: insert
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for me. I have an old, sealed off fireplace that I wanted do more with than just put in some candles. This insert was the best for the price I could find, and it actually arrived in half the time it was scheduled to.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best alternative to a gas fireplace
customer_reviews.text: This product gave new life to an old, unused wood burning fireplace! It looks great and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for small areas
customer_reviews.text: Great product, warms the room and gives it a nice cozy touch. I'm considering buying a larger version since the only downside is that I thought it would work for a larger area than it actually does - only the people near it can really enjoy the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Murilo Hauser

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great fireplace. Works just as I expected it to as a insert in an out door table. Quality is good and got lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Quick and easy to use, ready to go straight out of the box (aside from fuel). I love that you can just move it from room to room with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Foley

customer_reviews.title: Streamlined and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This firepit insert is the perfect size and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Liz P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Priced right and performs as well as the more expensive products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael DePaola

customer_reviews.title: Quality is key!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is key! These items are more than what was expected. Heavy duty and solid. Comes with a lighter, closing arm and funnel as well! So I bought 2!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Heavy gauge stainless steel with a beautiful finish. Nice attention to detail
customer_reviews.text: Really well made quality until. Heavy gauge stainless steel with a beautiful finish. Nice attention to detail!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Vilas

customer_reviews.title: A great buy. This fits well in the fireplace and ...
customer_reviews.text: A great buy. This fits well in the fireplace and cost much less than converting our fireplace into a gas burner. Very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C.

customer_reviews.title: Ignis EB1200 Ethanol Fireplace Burner Insert -
customer_reviews.text: I hated using my Chimnea since it always smoked so much making it impossible to sit and enjoy the fire. I ordered this insert with the fuel and it fits perfectly, is a clean and beautiful flame, so I can enjoy it either when I am alone or with company!! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia W.

customer_reviews.title: Ethanol fire place.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of your product surpassed my expectations along with ambiance of the fire. Well worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sauer

customer_reviews.title: the fire is very nice and the unit is easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fireplace to put in my old wood burning fireplace, the fire is very nice and the unit is easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: lan wu

customer_reviews.title: It is a fun change to our wood burning fireplace
customer_reviews.text: This is everything it says it is. It is a fun change to our wood burning fireplace. We look forward to using it. It's more for aesthetic than heat.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus A. Gagliardi

customer_reviews.title: They work great and increase the ambiance of any room
customer_reviews.text: I purchased six of these small fire boxes and installed them on a stone half wall. The flame comes off the top of the wall and the look is phenomenal. They work great and increase the ambiance of any room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing! No fumes and great flame
customer_reviews.text: I bought this burner to replace a gas log in my fireplace. It is amazing! No fumes and great flame. I just wish I had done this years ago! I would definately reccommend this to anyone. EB
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant fire feature
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Quality materials. I placed mine in a ceramic pot and it creates an elegant backyard fire feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product - easy to use, worked as desired and was a great accent to our out-door living space!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Solid steel and 3 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: Love this critter No smell Better heat output per hour than gas generator and 1500w heater Fuel easier to store Bought second one with grate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bio Ethanol Ventless Fireplace Burner Insert - EB1200 | Ignis
product_meta.description:
Size Name:Without GrateLimited only by your imagination our line Ethanol Burners can be utilized to build the fireplace of your dreams. All stainless steel double layer construction makes this perfect for any application. This burner can be used as a replacement or for a custom installation. The options are endless whether you build it in to a wall or place it in an existing fireplace. Dimensions: 11.25" x 5" x 3.25". Features: Ventless - no chimney, no gas or electric lines required. Easy or no maintenance required. Capacity: 1.5 Liter. Approximate burn time - 5 hour per refill. Approximate BTU output - 6000. Double Layer.
